nodes.title: ✨ Positive
widgets_values: A close-up shot of a young waitress in a european coffee house, her warm brown eyes meeting the camera with a gentle smile. She wears a black polka-dot dress with an elegant cream lace collar, her reddish-brown hair styled in an elaborate updo with delicate curls framing her subtle freckled face. Soft, warm light from overhead fixtures illuminates her features as she stands behind a counter. The camera begins slightly to her side, then slowly pushes in toward her face. In the blurred background, the soft teal walls and a glowing red "Stuckenberger" sign create a nostalgic atmosphere. The ambient sounds of clinking dishes, distant conversations, and the gentle hum of a jukebox fill the air. She tilts her head slightly and says in a friendly, warm voice: "Welcome to Stuckenbergers. What can I get for you today?" The mood is inviting, timeless, and full of a vienna coffee house charm.

nodes.title: Negative
widgets_values: blurry, low quality, still frame, frames, watermark, overlay, titles, has blurbox, has subtitles

nodes.title: Note
widgets_values:
- doesn't respect input image
- split settings - We need convenient pieces to work with in other video workflows
